Description: Rhomboid palette of mudstone (greywacke)with projections at the ends of the shorter axis. Some wear at centre on one side. Thick walled; oval in cross-section.
Curator's comments: Type 90D in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery and Palettes (1921) Palettes of this shape are discussed in Petrie, Prehistoric Egypt (London 1920), p. 38; Baumgartel, The cultures of Prehistoric Egypt II (Oxford 1960), p. 83
